text_block_list.text: When stopping by the Training Course today, I happened to spot Silence Suzuka running.
Since her trainer isn't here, is she doing her training independently? Thinking that, I ended up watching over her.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haaa… haa…Ah?!
When Silence Suzuka stumbled, I panicked and rushed to her. Don't tell me she's injured…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah… S-sorry. It's nothing, I'm fine. It's just… my feet feel a little heavy…
choice_data_list: Are you feeling out of sorts…?
Are you feeling out of sorts…?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Out of sorts… could that be it?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …something's wrong with me. Ever since that mock race.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: My legs feel heavy, as if they've been chained. As I keep running, eventually my vision starts to darken…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Pushing myself…? I'm not doing that. Normally, I could keep on running.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …I've always been running. Always. Running is everything to me.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: However, now… what should I do? This is the first time I've ever felt like this.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I feel like 'I don't want to run anymore'… This is… the first time…
It seems like she's really suffering. Is there anything I can do for her…?
For this girl that's lost sight of the excitement of running, is there anything?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huuu… Yeah… running at night is great, it's nice and quiet

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Now that I think about it, doesn't it seem like the stars are brighter tonight?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …hehe. This scenery, I have it all to myself
That reminds me, at that time… when Silence Suzuka was happily running, she was also enjoying the scenery around her.
If that's the case…
choice_data_list: For a change of pace, how about running in a different location?
For a change of pace, how about running in a different location?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: A different location…?
choice_data_list: Yeah, like a place with beautiful scenery

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Scenery…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: But, there isn't a place like that near school. I've visited most of the area on my runs…
choice_data_list: In that case, I'll show you
In that case, I'll show you

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …is that okay?
I led Silence Suzuka to a place with beautiful scenery where she could run to her heart's content.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Wow…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: While we were on the train, the sky seems to have cleared up. It's all green and bathed in sunlight… beautiful…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: That aside, this path… where does it lead…?
choice_data_list: How about running and finding out?
How about running and finding out?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …That's right. I'll go and see.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa… Fuuu.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (My feet still feel a little heavy… but…)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …A nice breeze. It feels cool…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Yeah. Let's run a little more.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (The feeling of both feet kicking the ground… my body is hot, the breeze is cool…)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (That's right. If I run like this, if I keep running like this, then eventually-)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haa, haaa…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (-I'll finally reach that quiet scenery)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (With only the sound of the wind and my beating heart. With nobody around, a whole new… world just for me…!)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: That's right, I…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa… haaaaaaauu…Fuuu.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Yes, I am. I ran my heart out, until it emptied my mind.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Because of that…I remembered.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: When I was little and just ran and ran, one day, my parents recommended I enter a race.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I entered the race thinking 'As long as I get to run'. At first… it was very stressful

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Being surrounded by so many… it was noisy, and uncomfortable.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: That's why… I thought I should go to a place where nobody was, and went out in front.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes. I thought 'I have to get to a place that nobody can follow'. When I ran my hardest, suddenly my eyes were opened.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: It became quiet… I reached that scenery with nobody around.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …I want to run out in front.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Once more, I want to reach that place again and again. These feelings alone…I won't concede…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I think I want to speak with my trainer now. To say "I can't run without Escaping".

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um, and so… um.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …do you think you can come with me? Speaking isn't one of my strong points…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: W-would that be okay…?
Let's return to school, and talk to Silence Suzuka's trainer…!
